title: 104_hr579
content:
The "Privatization of Humanities Act" repeals sections 7 and 8 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends Section 2 and Section 3 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing references to "the Humanities" and updating definitions. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" updates Section 4 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing references to "the Humanities" and redefining the establishment of the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends Section 9 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing references to "the Humanities" in various subsections. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends Section 10 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing references to "the Humanities" in administrative functions. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends Section 10 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by updating administrative functions related to the Chairperson's duties and activities. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" updates administrative functions related to the Chairperson's duties and activities under the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by specifying changes to financial assistance provisions for the National Endowment for the Arts and removing references to the National Endowment for the Humanities. The "Privatization of Humanities Act" amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by specifying changes to financial assistance provisions for the National Endowment for the Arts. SEC. 4 authorizes appropriations. Section 11 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended to remove certain subparagraphs and redesignate clauses in subsection (a)(1) and (a)(2). Section 11 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended by redesignating clauses and subparagraphs in subsections (a)(3), (a)(4), and (c). Section 11 of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 is amended by redesignating clauses and subparagraphs in subsections (a)(3), (a)(4), and (c). Additionally, amendments are made in subsections (d) and (e) by striking certain paragraphs and phrases. SEC. 5. SHORT TITLE. Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 by removing "and the Humanities".

SEC. 6. TRANSITION PROVISIONS. The Director of the Office of Management and Budget will oversee the termination of the National Endowment for the Humanities and the National Council on the Humanities, including the transfer of personnel, assets, and funds.

SEC. 7. EFFECTIVE DATES. Sets the effective dates for the amendments made by this Act. SEC. 7. EFFECTIVE DATES. This Act will take effect on the date of enactment, with specific sections becoming effective at the start of the first fiscal year after enactment.
